title: PODCAST: A bit of wrong news sways the markets today
description: False information from a Japanese newspaper affected investor activity today.

teaser: False information from a Japanese newspaper affected investor activity today.
itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Friday, September 13, 2013
contentencoded:
How did a former treasury secretary move markets today by doing absolutely nothing?

The effects of the 2008 financial crisis reverberated across the globe, hitting even disparate economies like Ireland, Iceland and Latvia.
